name: Fizz Feed
description:
A single-player, narrative, resource-management prototype made by  4 students in 24 hours.

Balance your fanbase, haters, and money in order to become a social media champion and land your dream job!

Deal with life's weekly events and try not to let them negatively affect your popularity.

Bug Note: resources can go into the negatives.

Bug Note: the same daily events can reoccur in one play through.
